def max_bouquets(r, g, b):
    flowers = sorted([r, g, b])
    if flowers[0] == 0:
        return flowers[1] // 3 + flowers[2] // 3
    ans = flowers[0]
    flowers[1] += ans
    flowers[2] -= ans
    ans += flowers[1] // 3 + flowers[2] // 3
    ans1 = flowers[0] - 1
    flowers[1] -= ans1
    flowers[2] -= ans1
    ans1 += flowers[1] // 3 + flowers[2] // 3
    ans2 = flowers[0] - 2
    flowers[1] -= ans2
    flowers[2] -= ans2
    ans2 += flowers[1] // 3 + flowers[2] // 3
    return max(ans, ans1, ans2)
